item.description: having read most of it now i can say that i also disagreed with a lot of it. i found a lot of the conclusions not very sound. the best bit of the whole thing was when he related someone else's research (the bagel guy - a real world example of â€¦

item.title: I think Mary Whitehouse came up with the best line...
item.description: I think Mary Whitehouse came up with the best line about free speech: 'Censorship is a dirty word in any society but there comes a point where you have to say 'Stop. What you are doing is wrong'.
item.dc:creator: Marc

item.title: what if you sold it to someone who used it a lot i...
item.description:
what if you sold it to someone who used it a lot in a frivolous way? wouldn't that be contributing to global warming?

and what if the person you sold it to wasn't a careful driver?

item.title: the book's not as good as the film IMO. the film l...
item.description: the book's not as good as the film IMO. the film leaves an ambiguity that is satisfying where the book makes it fairly clear that he is just a disturbed individual.
